sentence.text: Late-Stage Microsomal Oxidation Reduces Drug-Drug Interaction and Identifies Phosphodiesterase 2A Inhibitor PF-06815189.

Late-stage oxidation using liver microsomes was applied to phosphodiesterase 2 inhibitor 1 to reduce its clearance by cytochrome P450 enzymes, introduce renal clearance, and minimize the risk for victim drug-drug interactions
This approach yielded PF-06815189 (2) with improved physicochemical properties and a mixed metabolic profile
This example highlights the importance of C-H diversification methods to drug discovery
